# drawsBackground

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver draws its background.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var drawsBackground: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to cause the receiver to fill its background with the background color,  [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Setting graphics attributes

- **backgroundColor**: The receiver’s background color.
- **allowsDocumentBackgroundColorChange**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver allows its background color to change.
- **changeDocumentBackgroundColor(_:)**: An action method used to set the background color.
